name: GeoUnion Alfred-Wegener-Stiftung

goal: GeoUnion was established to support scientific collaboration between the geosciences and with neighbouring disciplines and to disseminate the importance, research questions and achievements of the geoscientific disciplines into the general public. GeoUnion organizes conferences, lecture series, seminars and publications to bring geosciences to a wider audience,
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Education, Energy, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
Research directives in Earth Sciences
Supporting the Geosciences in universities, schools and the general public
